wpt.name: GC14X0D
wpt.desc: Penn's Idylwood Cache by phi_fibonacci, Traditional Cache (2/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Penn's Idylwood Cache
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: The cache is located in a local park complete with a playground, basketball and tennis courts. Should be an easy find for first-timers and those with small children.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The cache is a micro-cache (35mm film canister). Its location should be fairly obvious once in the general area though there are a bunch of nooks where it might be stashed.
The cache is NOT big enough to hold any items other than its log scroll and small pencil.
Congrats to Woofiegrrl on the FTF!

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Quick grab before getting to work. TFTC. Pencil is gone and I forgot to bring one, so I didn't get to sign.
